channel.title: Project oNe
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]Project oNe[/b][/size]
Hello everyone. This is my Project that I'm doing. It's called "Project oNe", because it is my first major project, in which I'm going to spend a large amount of time developing before I release it. It's an AllStar-Scape v2 server base, and I'm using the MoparScape WebClient. I've got a load of work ahead of me, and I'm going to use this post to help me keep track of what I need to do, and what I have left. I started this project about a week and a half ago, so I've already got some of my agenda done. _________________________________________________[/center] [center][size=24pt][b]Updates[/b][/size][/center]
-Removing useless NPC's. 0% -Added NPC's in Ard, Yannile, Al-Kharid. 0% -Giving NPC's dialogues. 0% -Fixing the Jaw problem on the head of your char. 0% -Fixing animations. 10% -Fixing Jad. 20% -Removing over-used global objects. 40% -Removing all the useless commands and codes. 40% -Making the QuestTab usefull. Adding counters like Players Online. 70% -Added NPC's in Lumbridge, Varrock, and Draynor. 80% -Made Lumbridge the "home", and adding NPC's. 100% -Moved teleports to Mage Book instead of in the Option Tab. 70% -Made Rock Crabs the training area. 100% -Removed the failed version of vengeance. 100% -Scattered shops around somewhat to seem more realistic. 100% -Removed the gay PKBoxes. 100% -Got rid of the GS Mini. 100% -Added a Barrow Brother killcount; need 6 to open the box. 100% -Made everywhere but Wildy "safe". As in, you can't get PK'd. 100%
[center]_________________________________________________[/center]
[center][size=24pt][b]Skills[/b][/size][/center] _______
[size=18pt]Melee[/size] 20%
-Toying around with timers, trying to get things just right. -Changing Exp Rates. -Editing item bonuses.
[size=18pt]Mage[/size] 10%
-Trying to get all spells working. (Gonna be a pain) -Going to add autocasting. -Gonna get multi-casting working. -Gotta change timers. -Some animations are messed up. -Need to edit projectiles. -Adding mage folowing
[size=18pt]Range[/size] 10%
-Going to make bows only use up to certain arrows. -I need to add a special to the mage shortbow. -Changing animations due to some being messed up. -Fixing Exp Rates. -Changing projectiles and timers. -Adding range folowing. -Installing crossbows and bolts.
[size=18pt]Prayer[/size] 10%
-Adding Chivalry and Piety -Making sure all prayers work completely. -Fixing prayer formulas. -Adding bone + alter training. -Removing all bones from shops.
[size=18pt]RuneCrafting[/size] 25%
-Adding Essence and Pure essence mine. -Removing Essence from stores. -Adding RuneCrafting pouches. -Making the Abyss work. -Making all alters work.
[size=18pt]Agility[/size] 30%
-Changing Exp rates. -Finishing Gnome agility coarse. -Fixing animations.
[size=18pt]Herblore[/size] 15%
-Adding Unf. Pots were an herb + an ingredient is needed. -Fixing exp rates. -Making sure all potions give proper bonuses.
[size=18pt]Thieving[/size] 30%
-Fixing rates. -Giving items from stalls. -Adding delays closer to real runescape timers. -Adding pickpocketing. -When pickpocketing, you can get stunned.
[size=18pt]Crafting[/size] 10%
-Cutting uncut gems with chisel needs fixing. -Cut Gems + Spun Wool = Unenchanted amulet. -Flax needs to be spinnable. -Fixing needle on leather, and you need string.
[size=18pt]Fletching[/size] 15%
-Cutting logs will give you unfinished bows. -Using the bow with bowstring will give a decent amount of Exp. -Arrow and bolt making needs to be added.
[size=18pt]Slayer[/size] 40%
-NPC's in the slayer tower will give you slayer Exp for killing them. -I still need to make certain creatures require certain slayer levels.
[size=18pt]Mining[/size] 20%
-I need to fix the animations. -Timers need fixing. -Rock respawn times need editing.
[size=18pt]Smithing[/size] 30%
-Need to fix the smithing interface up a bit. -Still need to change Exp rates. -Smelting needs work.
[size=18pt]Fishing[/size] 10%
-Need to fix fishing spots. -Gotta change the Exp rate, and the catch rate. -Need to fix animations. -Adding whirlpools.
[size=18pt]Cooking[/size] 20%
-Gotta change cook times, atm you cook 27 pieces of food in 10 seconds. -Need to add burning. -I need to make all food cookable. Including pies, pizzas, etc. -Also need to add cooking gloves. -Adding Cooking on fire and ranges.
[size=18pt]Firemaking[/size] 40%
-Need to add correct animations. -Adding 1 step movement after lighting a fire. -Also changing timers.
[size=18pt]WoodCutting[/size] 10%
-Need to make all trees cuttable. -Hatchets need to work better when the metal is better. -Need to fix timers. -Need to fix animations. -Adding emps.
[size=18pt]Farming[/size] 10%
-Adding seeds should give you the correct herb or plant. -Need to add compost, and super compost. -Making grow time, but it's super short. -Plants survive better if they get watered. -Collecting from an herb or plant should give you multiples. -You need a rake for weeds, and a spade to bury the seed.
[center]_________________________________________________[/center]
ADDING MORE LATER.. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/projectoNe.png[/img]

item.title: Project oNe
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

This will be great once you’re done, but I would like the beards fixed too for a different source because (I’m prepared to be ashamed) I tried a blank source (forgot name) and I had no jaw so I through the source in my recycle bin.
/ashamed :o

Read full topic

item.title: Project oNe
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

TimeBroken:

Thanks man. It’s one of my lower priorities atm though, so I’m not to terribly focused on it for now, but I’m gonna deffinatly have it fixed before I decide to release this.

Ya, facial hair is important. You could though, however, force a faskmask on every player and not tell them they have a hole in their face.

Read full topic

item.title: Project oNe
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

Thanks man. It’s one of my lower priorities atm though, so I’m not to terribly focused on it for now, but I’m gonna deffinatly have it fixed before I decide to release this.

Read full topic

item.title: Project oNe
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You basically just have to add another int/prop byte thingy in your Player class for the beard. There is a tutorial out there somewhere, have a look. I’ll keep an eye out for you too.

I usually just rip the beard fix from another similar source, but if you don’t know what you’re doing then make back-ups.

Read full topic

item.title: Project oNe
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

Mendorphins:

Great project. Are you okay on fixing the beards?

I honestly have no clue as to how to do it, but I’m sure there’s a tutorial somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Project oNe
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:2, topic:387747”]Hey, someone who doesn’t type like a retarded drunk 3 year old monkey on heroin.

On-topic, make sure to fix the glitches, dupes, etc. Other then that, good luck.[/quote]

Yeah, I’ve got A LOT instore for myself, but I think I can handle it. I might have to get some help from my friends every once and a while, but in the end, it’ll be worth it

Read full topic

item.description:

On-topic, make sure to fix the glitches, dupes, etc. Other then that, good luck.

item.title: Project oNe
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Project oNe[/size]

Hello everyone. This is my Project that I’m doing. It’s called “Project oNe”, because it is my first major project, in which I’m going to spend a large amount of time developing before I release it. It’s an AllStar-Scape v2 server base, and I’m using the MoparScape WebClient. I’ve got a load of work ahead of me, and I’m going to use this post to help me keep track of what I need to do, and what I have left. I started this project about a week and a half ago, so I’ve already got some of my agenda done.
_________________________________________________[/center]
[center][size=24pt]Updates[/size][/center]

-Removing useless NPC’s. 0%
-Added NPC’s in Ard, Yannile, Al-Kharid. 0%
-Giving NPC’s dialogues. 0%
-Fixing the Jaw problem on the head of your char. 0%
-Fixing animations. 10%
-Fixing Jad. 20%
-Removing over-used global objects. 40%
-Removing all the useless commands and codes. 40%
-Making the QuestTab usefull. Adding counters like Players Online. 70%
-Added NPC’s in Lumbridge, Varrock, and Draynor. 80%
-Made Lumbridge the “home”, and adding NPC’s. 100%
-Moved teleports to Mage Book instead of in the Option Tab. 70%
-Made Rock Crabs the training area. 100%
-Removed the failed version of vengeance. 100%
-Scattered shops around somewhat to seem more realistic. 100%
-Removed the gay PKBoxes. 100%
-Got rid of the GS Mini. 100%
-Added a Barrow Brother killcount; need 6 to open the box. 100%
-Made everywhere but Wildy “safe”. As in, you can’t get PK’d. 100%

[center]_________________________________________________[/center]

[center][size=24pt]Skills[/size][/center]

[size=18pt]Melee[/size] 20%

-Toying around with timers, trying to get things just right.
-Changing Exp Rates.
-Editing item bonuses.

[size=18pt]Mage[/size] 10%

-Trying to get all spells working. (Gonna be a pain)
-Going to add autocasting.
-Gonna get multi-casting working.
-Gotta change timers.
-Some animations are messed up.
-Need to edit projectiles.
-Adding mage folowing

[size=18pt]Range[/size] 10%

-Going to make bows only use up to certain arrows.
-I need to add a special to the mage shortbow.
-Changing animations due to some being messed up.
-Fixing Exp Rates.
-Changing projectiles and timers.
-Adding range folowing.
-Installing crossbows and bolts.

[size=18pt]Prayer[/size] 10%

-Adding Chivalry and Piety
-Making sure all prayers work completely.
-Fixing prayer formulas.
-Adding bone + alter training.
-Removing all bones from shops.

[size=18pt]RuneCrafting[/size] 25%

-Adding Essence and Pure essence mine.
-Removing Essence from stores.
-Adding RuneCrafting pouches.
-Making the Abyss work.
-Making all alters work.

[size=18pt]Agility[/size] 30%

-Changing Exp rates.
-Finishing Gnome agility coarse.
-Fixing animations.

[size=18pt]Herblore[/size] 15%

-Adding Unf. Pots were an herb + an ingredient is needed.
-Fixing exp rates.
-Making sure all potions give proper bonuses.

[size=18pt]Thieving[/size] 30%

-Fixing rates.
-Giving items from stalls.
-Adding delays closer to real runescape timers.
-Adding pickpocketing.
-When pickpocketing, you can get stunned.

[size=18pt]Crafting[/size] 10%

-Cutting uncut gems with chisel needs fixing.
-Cut Gems + Spun Wool = Unenchanted amulet.
-Flax needs to be spinnable.
-Fixing needle on leather, and you need string.

[size=18pt]Fletching[/size] 15%

-Cutting logs will give you unfinished bows.
-Using the bow with bowstring will give a decent amount of Exp.
-Arrow and bolt making needs to be added.

[size=18pt]Slayer[/size] 40%

-NPC’s in the slayer tower will give you slayer Exp for killing them.
-I still need to make certain creatures require certain slayer levels.

[size=18pt]Mining[/size] 20%

-I need to fix the animations.
-Timers need fixing.
-Rock respawn times need editing.

[size=18pt]Smithing[/size] 30%

-Need to fix the smithing interface up a bit.
-Still need to change Exp rates.
-Smelting needs work.

[size=18pt]Fishing[/size] 10%

-Need to fix fishing spots.
-Gotta change the Exp rate, and the catch rate.
-Need to fix animations.
-Adding whirlpools.

[size=18pt]Cooking[/size] 20%

-Gotta change cook times, atm you cook 27 pieces of food in 10 seconds.
-Need to add burning.
-I need to make all food cookable. Including pies, pizzas, etc.
-Also need to add cooking gloves.
-Adding Cooking on fire and ranges.

[size=18pt]Firemaking[/size] 40%

-Need to add correct animations.
-Adding 1 step movement after lighting a fire.
-Also changing timers.

[size=18pt]WoodCutting[/size] 10%

-Need to make all trees cuttable.
-Hatchets need to work better when the metal is better.
-Need to fix timers.
-Need to fix animations.
-Adding emps.

[size=18pt]Farming[/size] 10%

-Adding seeds should give you the correct herb or plant.
-Need to add compost, and super compost.
-Making grow time, but it’s super short.
-Plants survive better if they get watered.
-Collecting from an herb or plant should give you multiples.
-You need a rake for weeds, and a spade to bury the seed.

[center]_________________________________________________[/center]

ADDING MORE LATER…

Read full topic
